allowaccess.help: Control management access to the managed extender. Separate entries with a space.
allowaccess.name: allowaccess

options.help: PING access.
options.name: ping

options.help: TELNET access.
options.name: telnet

options.help: HTTP access.
options.name: http

options.help: HTTPS access.
options.name: https

options.help: SSH access.
options.name: ssh

options.help: SNMP access.
options.name: snmp

options.help: Controller is configured to not provide service to this FortiExtender.
options.name: disable

options.help: Controller is configured to provide service to this FortiExtender.
options.name: enable

enforce-bandwidth.help: Enable/disable enforcement of bandwidth on LAN extension interface.
enforce-bandwidth.name: enforce-bandwidth

options.help: Enable to enforce bandwidth limit on LAN extension interface.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable to enforce bandwidth limit on LAN extension interface.
options.name: disable

options.help: FortiExtender wan-extension.
options.name: wan-extension

options.help: FortiExtender lan-extension.
options.name: lan-extension

login-password.help: Set the managed extender's administrator password.
login-password.name: login-password

login-password-change.help: Change or reset the administrator password of a managed extender (yes, default, or no, default = no).
login-password-change.name: login-password-change

options.help: Change the managed extender's administrator password. Use the login-password option to set the password.
options.name: yes

options.help: Keep the managed extender's administrator password set to the factory default.
options.name: default

options.help: Do not change the managed extender's administrator password.
options.name: no

override-allowaccess.help: Enable to override the extender profile management access configuration.
override-allowaccess.name: override-allowaccess

options.help: Override the extender profile management access configuration.
options.name: enable

options.help: Use the extender profile management access configuration.
options.name: disable

override-enforce-bandwidth.help: Enable to override the extender profile enforce-bandwidth setting.
override-enforce-bandwidth.name: override-enforce-bandwidth

options.help: Enable override of FortiExtender profile bandwidth setting.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable override of FortiExtender profile bandwidth setting.
options.name: disable

override-login-password-change.help: Enable to override the extender profile login-password (administrator password) setting.
override-login-password-change.name: override-login-password-change

options.help: Override the WTP profile login-password (administrator password) setting.
options.name: enable

options.help: Use the the WTP profile login-password (administrator password) setting.
options.name: disable
